Package org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.meta

Interface Constraint<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - value type
    public interface Constraint<V>
    Perform a validation on data upon load.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static interface  Constraint.Factory<A extends Annotation,​V>
      Provider for a specific constraint given a field type.

       throws SerializationException
        Check if the provided deserialized value matches an expected condition.

        Throws:

      • required

        static <T extends Annotation> Constraint.Factory<T,​Object> required()
        Require a value to be present for fields marked with the annotation T.
        Type Parameters:
        T - marker annotation type
        Returns:
        new constraint factory

      • pattern

        static Constraint.Factory<Matches,​String> pattern()
        Require values to match the pattern provided.

        Upon failure, an error message will be taken from the annotation.

        Returns:
        factory providing matching pattern test

      • localizedPattern

        static Constraint.Factory<Matches,​String> localizedPattern​(ResourceBundle bundle)
        Require values to match the pattern provided.

        Upon failure, an error message will be taken from bundle with a key defined in the annotation.

        Parameters:
        bundle - source for localized messages
        Returns:
        factory providing matching pattern test
